oai_dc:dc.dc:otherSubject: Agricultural products; Akka (Palestine); British colonialism; Building practices; Building stones; Childhood; Children's games; Coeducation; Dwellings; Embroidery; Entertainment; Family structure; Farmers; Intervillage relations; Landowners; Mosques; Orchards; Qurʼānic teaching; Siblings; Social classes; Social norms; Sūq; Water resources; Water wells; Women education; al-Qāwūqjī, Fawzī, 1890-1977; Arab countries; Arab Salvation Army; British army camps; British colonialism; Defense; Destruction; Dispersion; Displacement; Emotions; Executions; Expulsion from Palestine; Gold; Guards; Haganah; Ḥarb al-Mukhayyamāt, 1985-1988; Ḥawwāsah Massacre; House raid; International Committee of the International Committee of the Red Cross; Jamʻiyyat al-Kaff al-Aswad; Lebanon; Majd al-Kurūm (Palestine); Massacres; Means of transportation; Military training; Mothers; Nostalgia; Palestinian-Zionist relations; Refugee experience; Return; Revolutionaries; Taxes; Village siege; Weapon acquisition; Women in armed conflicts; Zionist Invasion of Palestine, 1948
oai_dc:dc.dc:biography: The interview was recorded on August 28, 2005 with Ṣafīyah Aḥmad ‘Anbatāwī, female, born in 1937 in al-Manshīyah, Palestine, resides in Burj al-Barājinah Palestinian Refugee Camp, Lebanon.
oai_dc:dc.dc:biographyAR: سجلت المقابلة مع صفية أحمد عنبتاوي في 28 آب أغسطس عام 2005، أنثى، ولدت عام 1937 في المنشية، فلسطين وتقيم في مخيم برج البراجنة للاجئين الفلسطينيين، لبنان.
oai_dc:dc.dc:toc: Socio-economic conditions at al-Manshīyah under British mandate. (@ 0:08)
oai_dc:dc.dc:tocAR: الظروف الاجتماعية الاقتصادية في المنشية تحت الانتداب البريطاني. (@ 0:08)
oai_dc:dc.dc:toc: The Zionist occupation and the expulsion to Lebanon . (@ 15:12)
